title: rustbuild: stage0 can't compile rustc_bitflags due to #![feature]
body:
I'm terribly sorry for the uninformative title. But rustbuild is giving me literally no information to put in:

```
$ ./x.py test src/test/compile-fail --stage 1 --test-args recursion_limit
```
